English.Text: There is no sign of the Pyrphorians, at least not that any of your twits see. Giving up their search, they begin stopping locals in the street. Most shake them off and walk on in a hurry. But they finally seem to strike lucky when two boys cheerily agree to help for a bit of coin. They lead your band to a warehouse from which they claim eerie sounds emanate at night, in their words, like "stakes being driven through the hearts of vampyrs." The door to the warehouse looks breakable.
